Package Model

Class Wall

java.lang.Object
Model.Wall
public class Wall
extends java.lang.Object
This is Wall class. Implements game logics and operations.
Since:
24 November 2021
Version:
0.2
Author:
Chin Hong Shen

  • Constructor Details

    • Wall

      public Wall​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio, java.awt.Point ballPos)
      This is Wall class constructor. Construct wall object. Initialises variables and performs instantiation.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - represents area of the rectangle
      brickCount - represents number of bricks
      lineCount - represents the layers to form a wall
      brickDimensionRatio - represents the ratio of the height and width of a brick
      ballPos - represents the ball location

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move()
      This method is used to determine the movement of player and ball.

    • findImpacts

      public void findImpacts()
      This method is used to determine what operations should be done if the ball contacts with player bar or the border of the game window.

    • impactWall

      private boolean impactWall()
      This method is used to determine if the ball contact with which direction of the brick. Different directions (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT) of the brick will lead to the different crack directions.
      Returns:
      true if the ball contact with the brick

    • impactBorder

      private boolean impactBorder()
      This method is used to determine if the ball contact with the border of the game window.
      Returns:
      true is the ball has contact with the border of game window

    • initialiseSpeed

      public void initialiseSpeed()
      This method is used to initialise the ball speed in the beginning of the game. Instantiate RubberBall class.

    • ballReset

      public void ballReset()
      This method is used to determine the ball and player ball location in the beginning of the game. The ball speed is reset if the ball is lost.

    • wallReset

      public void wallReset()
      This method is used to reset the wall in the original state after game over, next level and restarting the game.

    • getHighScore

      public java.lang.String getHighScore()
      This method is used to get and display high score during the game.
      Returns:
      a string that display the player's name and high score

    • checkScore

      public void checkScore()
      This method is used to check high score. Compares old and current high score. If player create new high score, pop up a panel to let player enters their name.

    • ballEnd

      public boolean ballEnd()
      This method is used to determine if the number of ball lives depleted.
      Returns:
      true if the ball count equals to zero

    • isDone

      public boolean isDone()
      This method is used to determine if the level is finished.
      Returns:
      true if there is no brick left in a level

    • nextLevel

      public void nextLevel()
      This method is used to set next level.

    • hasLevel

      public boolean hasLevel()
      This method is used to determine if there is another level.
      Returns:
      true if there is a next level

    • setBallXSpeed

      public void setBallXSpeed​(int s)
      This method is used to determine the ball speed in horizontal direction.
      Parameters:
      s - represents the horizontal speed value

    • setBallYSpeed

      public void setBallYSpeed​(int s)
      This method is used to determine the ball speed in vertical direction.
      Parameters:
      s - represents the vertical speed value

    • resetBallCount

      public void resetBallCount()
      This method is used to reset ball count if player press on Reset Balls button in debug panel.

    • getBrickCount

      public int getBrickCount()
      This method is used to get brick count.
      Returns:
      number of brick count

    • getBallCount

      public int getBallCount()
      This method is used to get ball count.
      Returns:
      number of ball count

    • isBallLost

      public boolean isBallLost()
      This method is used to determine if the ball is lost.
      Returns:
      true if the ball is lost

    • getBricks

      public Brick[] getBricks()
      This method is used to get bricks.
      Returns:
      array of brick

    • getBall

      public Ball getBall()
      This method is used to get ball.
      Returns:
      the ball

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      This method is used to get player bar.
      Returns:
      the player

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      This method is used to get score. If users break a brick, they will be rewarded for one score.
      Returns:
      score value

    • scoreReset

      public int scoreReset()
      This method is used to reset score to zero after game over.
      Returns:
      zero score

    • setScore

      public void setScore​(int score)
      This method is used to set the score.
      Parameters:
      score - represents the score value
